commands.name: StatusCheck
commands.title: Checks the status of USB flash module
commands.description: To work with USB flash module and read data, USB flash module must be plugged in.

commands.name: Connect
commands.title: Connects to the USB flash
commands.description: Connects to the USB flash that is plugged in.

commands.name: Disconnect
commands.title: Disconnects from the USB flash
commands.description: Disconnects from USB flash that is plugged in.

variables.name: result
variables.title: Result
variables.description: Result of connect or disconnect request

variables.name: status
variables.title: Status
variables.description: Indicates if module mounted as USB device
